---
title: "Modeling for Animal Shelter Data"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r data_split}
seed <- 333
inTraining <- createDataPartition(titanic_data$Survived, p=0.6, list=FALSE)
training.set <- titanic_data[inTraining,]
Totalvalidation.set <- titanic_data[-inTraining,]

# This will create another partition of the 40% of the data, so 20%-testing and 20%-validation

inValidation <- createDataPartition(Totalvalidation.set$Survived, p=0.5, list=FALSE)
testing.set <- Totalvalidation.set[inValidation,]
validation.set <- Totalvalidation.set[-inValidation,]
```
